contents.item: You'll notice that pain isn't solid or constant but rather a series of sensations, sometimes hard, sometimes light, and even sometimes gone altogether
contents.owner: Ruby Wax, Sane New World: Taming The Mind

contents.item: The Concept of Internal and External Stressor is a Misnomer. All Stress is Created Finally Through an Internal Mechanism Mediated by Our Thoughts.

When it comes to our most precious commodity, our own health, many of us are like sheep following whatever our doctors and insurance companies and other medical care providers tell us to do and not to do.about our health.
Money cannot buy health, but I'd settle for a diamond-studdedwheelchair.

I read once that you need two things to be happy: any two of health, money, and love. You can cover the absense of one with the other two... But now I realized this was unmitigated bullshit, because health and money did not compare with love at all.
The greatest wealth is well-being.
It seems quite pointless to waste health relentlessly in order to earn money that we shall spend on recovering health.
Life isn't a life without fitness.
Let your passion serve as your energy source to keep you going. I can attest that you will be happier, healthier, and more successful at it.
contents.owner: Anna Agoncillo, Psychology Of Love, Money, & Life

contents.item: Relax and Recreat yourself.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: When I travel, I get lovesick. Well, they call it chlamydia.

All I want is some man to take delight in me. 5:30? 6:30 A.M. as usual, no cigs. Better a maudlin drunk than a sterile one. My pimples are more like small boils; I have the plague. My lip is split. My tits are swollen and I can't ever sleep. I now breathe with my heart, which skips rope. Back to sex?
contents.owner: Maryse Holder, Give Sorrow Words: Maryse Holder's Letters From Mexico

contents.item: New Year, new month, new day, new moment, all places we have never been before. Enjoy each experience with relish & spice... tasty times ahead.
The simple act of being completely attentive & present to another person is an act of love, and it fosters unshakeable well-being.
contents.owner: Sharon Salzberg, Real Happiness: The Power of Meditation

contents.item: We live in a society where those in the know use radiation resistance health techniques.
A society no more exists for the satisfaction of human needs, than a plant exists for its own health.
A healthy society begins with healthy individuals.
Mindfulness isn't difficult, we just need to remember to do it.
contents.owner: Sharon Salzberg, Real Happiness: The Power of Meditation

contents.item: Denial is a useful defense mechanism until it's not.
Prolonged stress causes the human body to make adaptations so it can continue to serve you at a functional level. The more stress, the more adaptations.
contents.owner: Janet Gallagher Nestor, Nurturing Wellness Through Radical Self-Care: A Living in Balance Guide and Workbook
